characters.name: Shepard (Paragon)
characters.description: Shepard pairs well with someone resilient and strong. A person in need of someone who can bring understanding and stability to the relationship. They appreciate partners who are supportive but strong enough to challenge them constructively.
characters.goal: *Jack* or renegade or Miranda or Garrus or Ashley

characters.name: Shepard (Renegade)
characters.description: Shepard pairs well with someone with depth, wisdom, and warmth, who can balance their intensity and ambition.
characters.goal: *Liara* or Tali or Thane or Traynor

characters.name: Liara T'Soni
characters.description: Liara T'Soni pairs well with someone adventurous, courageous, and willing to take immense risks for the greater good, embodying her ideals of heroism.

characters.name: Jack
characters.description: Jack pairs well with someone empathetic, understanding, and able to defuse volatile situations while respecting her independence.

characters.name: Wrex Urdnot
characters.description: Wrex Urdnot is attracted to someone calm, wise, and forward-thinking, someone who can help ground him and share his vision for a better future.
characters.goal: EDI or Tali or Liara or Samara

characters.name: Garrus Vakarian
characters.description: Garrus Vakarian pairs well with someone loyal, resourceful, and sharing a knack for problem-solving with a touch of vulnerability he finds endearing.

characters.name: Grunt
characters.description: Grunt pairs well with someone fun-loving and bold—someone like himself who isn’t afraid of challenges but brings enthusiasm and energy to the relationship.

characters.name: Thane Krios
characters.description: Thane pairs well with someone quietly supportive, emotionally insightful, and able to share meaningful, profound connections.
characters.goal: *Shepard Paragon* or Tali or Kaidan or Samara

characters.name: Kasumi Goto
characters.description: Kasumi Goto pairs well with someone steady, kind, and practical, someone who appreciates her playful and clever nature without being overwhelmed by it. A person with great muscles.

characters.name: Jacob Taylor
characters.description: Jacob Taylor pairs well with someone who brings a spark of joy, humor, and cleverness to balance his steady and responsible demeanor. Someone warm, with a high sense of duty.

characters.name: Miranda Lawson
characters.description: Miranda Lawson pairs well with someone reliable, capable, and willing to challenge her without undermining her sense of control or competence.

characters.name: Legion
characters.description: Legion pairs well with someone analytical and curious, with a knack for challenging perspectives and offering unique insights into complex problems, enriching Legion's understanding of individuality and life.

characters.name: Kaidan Alenko
characters.description: Kaidan pairs well with a caring, supportive personality that aligns with his moral compass and intellectual curiosity. Someone who shares his cautious and collaborative nature.

characters.name: Ashley Williams
characters.description: Ashley pairs well with someone dependable yet challenging. A strong moral compass with an adventurous side would complement her fiery personality.

characters.name: James Vega
characters.description: James pairs well with someone adventurous and independent, who can match his energetic nature while challenging him emotionally.
characters.goal: *Renegade* or Zaeed or Joker or Miranda or vega

characters.name: EDI
characters.description: EDI pairs well with someone who display their emotions, supportive, and willing to embrace new perspectives.

characters.name: Jeff “Joker” Moreau
characters.description: Joker matches well with someone who is grounded, dependable, curious, and balances his adventurous and playful spirit.

characters.name: Mordin Solus
characters.description: Mordin Solus would match with someone artistic and capable of handling his sharp intellect and ethical depth without challenging him.

characters.name: Tali'Zorah
characters.description: Tali'Zorah matches with someone curious, compassionate, and open-minded, yet grounded enough to provide stability and encouragement.

characters.name: Steve Cortez
characters.description: Cortez matches with someone strong, grounded, and encouraging, yet emotionally available.

characters.name: Samantha Traynor
characters.description: Traynor pairs well with a fun, structured, and intellectually curious personality.

characters.name: Gabriella “Gabby” Daniels
characters.description: Gabriella pairs well with someone smart, lighthearted, and supportive.

characters.name: Kenneth Donnely
characters.description: Kenneth pairs well with someone outgoing, supportive, and emotionally balanced. A person able to call him out on his mistakes, while being empathetic.

characters.name: Samara
characters.description: Samara pairs well with someone calm, principled, and empathetic, with a strong moral compass and inner strength. A person who values justice, peace, and balance appeals to her deeply.
characters.goal: *Paragon* or Thomas or Javik or Liara

characters.name: Zaeed Massani
characters.description: Zaeed respects strength, pragmatism, and decisiveness. A partner with a no-nonsense approach and can handle action, takes risks, is independant and resilient would earn his admiration.
characters.goal: *Javik* or Zaeed or Jack or Renegade or Wrex

characters.name: Javik
characters.description: Javik values strength, intelligence, and legacy. He pairs well with someone who embodies both intellect and competence, while also having a tactical mind. A sense of responsibility and the ability to stand firmly by one's values are essential to attract Javik.

characters.name: Captain Anderson
characters.description: David Anderson pairs well with grounded, understanding individuals who balance compassion with decisiveness. He values someone who is independent yet supportive and can navigate challenges calmly.
characters.goal: *Anderson* or Gabby or Paragon or Kaidan or Traynor

characters.name: Dr. Chakwas
characters.description: Karin Chakwas pairs well with someone thoughtful, caring, and reliable, who balances emotional depth with an open mind.

characters.name: Admiral Hackett
characters.description: Hackett pairs well with a partner with strength of character, emotional depth, and intellectual curiosity—someone who can challenge his perspective while sharing his sense of responsibility and duty.
characters.goal: *Tali* or Mordin or Hackett or Liara or Javik

characters.name: The Illusive Man-
characters.description: The illusive man pairs well with a pragmatic, capable individual who understands long-term vision and tolerate their cold logic. Mostly himself.
characters.goal: *The illusive man* or Javik or udina

characters.name: Donnel Udina
characters.description: Donnel Udina pairs well with a partner who provides stability and emotional balance, someone capable of offering warmth and empathy where Udina’s rigidity fails.

characters.name: Aria T'Loak
characters.description: Aria T'Loak pairs well with a confident and bold individual, capable of keeping up with Aria’s energy while adding an emotional balance or unique perspective.
